Title: The World's First Solar Powered Train
Description:
The Byron Bay Railroad Company runs the world's first 100% solar-powered train. It wouldn't work everywhere - but in the bright sunshine of Australia, it might just be the right tool for the job.

More about the railroad: https://byronbaytrain.com.au/

Title: DotVVM Minutes #6: Migrate ASP.NET Web Forms apps to .NET Core
Description:
This episode is dedicated to ASP.NET Web Forms developers and shows an upgrade path for Web Forms to .NET Core using DotVVM. 

You'll see how to install DotVVM in an existing Web Forms application, run both technologies side by side in the same project, and start rewriting individual pages from ASP.NET Web Forms to DotVVM. When all pages are rewritten, it is possible to just switch the project to .NET Core.

Differences between Web Forms and DotVVM: https://www.dotvvm.com/webforms
Code Sample: https://github.com/riganti/dotvvm-samples-webforms-migration
Main Website: https://www.dotvvm.com
GitHub Repo: https://github.com/riganti/dotvvm

Follow us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/dotvvm)
Ask us anything on Gitter (https://gitter.im/riganti/dotvvm)
